snippet: The businesses that will suffer the most from the change, a social media specialist says, are those who are barely active on Facebook: "Timeline will show off that they haven't touched their page since 2009."
abstract: The businesses that will suffer the most from the change, a social media specialist says, are those who are barely active on Facebook: "Timeline will show off that they haven't touched their page since 2009."

headline.main: Drilling Down: Facebook Timeline Changes the Game
